name: Museum LXXVI
description:
First in a series of slightly animated, mildly interactive and very short non commercial projects from videogame zinesters MuseumLXXVI.

Controls: Move = W/A/S/D Look = Mouse

Mildly interactive art show as opposed to game.

Non Violent, Non addictive, passively interactive, sensory experience.

Made possible with asset stores and royalty free sound libraries.
